name: extension-device

type.description: Extension device type to get recommended firmwares for. [fortiswitch|fortiap|fortiextender]

version.description: Target firmware version of the parent FortiGate.

GET.summary:
Retrieve a list of recommended firmwares for the specified extension device type.
Access Group: any

help: Retrieve a list of recommended firmwares for the specified extension device type.

fds_response.title: FortiGuard Distribution Server Response

model_versions.title: Model Firmware Versions
model_versions.description: List of recommended firmware version information of specified extension device for the specified FortiOS version.

response_description: Retrieves a list of recommended firmware version of specified extension device for a specific FortiOS version.
